subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Levi Leipheimer did not get the chance to race against Lance Armstrong, the defending champion, in the Life Time Fitness Leadville Trail 100 mountain bike race in Colorado.
snippet: Levi Leipheimer did not get the chance to race against Lance Armstrong, the defending champion, in the Life Time Fitness Leadville Trail 100 mountain bike race in Colorado.
